meanings.definition: Convert (an image or graphic) into pixels for display on a screen.
meanings.sent1: I will rasterize the picture to make it show on the computer.
meanings.sent2: Graphic designers often rasterize images to ensure they appear correctly on websites.
meanings.sent3: Why did the computer refuse to rasterize the photo? It pixelated and ran away!
meanings.sent4: Her mind seemed to rasterize the memories, each one becoming a vivid pixel in her thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brushstrokes rasterize the canvas, creating a digital masterpiece.

meanings.definition: To represent (a digital image) as a raster image.
meanings.sent1: We need to rasterize the logo before uploading it to the website.
meanings.sent2: The software can rasterize the high-resolution image into a format suitable for printing.
meanings.sent3: The computer tried to rasterize the photo, but it ended up looking like a pixelated cartoon character!
meanings.sent4: His words seemed to rasterize in her mind, forming a clear image of his message.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight rasterized the landscape, turning it into a stunning digital painting.
